headline: Show HN: Rupt – AI that finds you better stocks
description:
Hi there HN!

Slava here. I’m building Rupt, an app that puts stock analysis on autopilot. It analyzes stock fundamentals, technicals, analyst ratings and hedge funds data. It then converts this information into a single consensus score and updates it every 15 minutes to show investors where the smart money is moving.

You can try Rupt for FREE FOR 7 DAYS, but if you wish to continue using it, use this link to get a discount on your membership: https://rupt.page.link/WLAsY5mBocTU2Bmn7

There are thousands of different stocks and hundreds of indicators to check each day. Rupt does all this work for you. It breaks down the most important elements of a stock, looks at it from every angle, and makes recommendations. Our proprietary algorithm analyzes 50+ crucial fundamental and technical metrics, analyst rankings, hedge fund activity and other data points on a stock, then aggregates all this information into one simple comprehensive score – the Rupt Score. I have spent countless hours backtesting our numbers to ensure we are not relying on hype or fluff. That's why I'm confident that Rupt can help you get more out of your investments.

Please feel free to stop by with any questions. I’d love to hear your feedback.

Slava
